name: Please Save the Bees
description:
This game was created with bitsy for the pollinators #bitsyjam.

The creation of "Please Save the Bees" was a way for me to share with you how important bees are to our ecosystem, the threats they face, and what we need to do to save them from extinction.

To play use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move around. On a touch screen device simply flick the screen in the direction you would like to go.
